law.catch_line: Except as provided by § 7-601 of this article, a warehouseman or his officer, agent, or employee ma...
law.text:
Except as provided by § 7-601 of this article, a warehouseman or his officer, agent, or employee may not deliver goods out of the possession of the warehouseman:
With knowledge that a negotiable warehouse receipt, the negotiation of which would transfer the right to the possession of the goods, is outstanding and uncancelled; and
Without obtaining the possession of the warehouse receipt at or before the time of the delivery.
